name: Square Battle
description:
2 Player Competitive Multi-Tasking Strategy RTS game!

Play with your friends!

Fast Paced Strategy!

This game will change your life!

Controls:

Arrow Keys/WASD, Enter/Space, ESC (Navigate Menus)

(Player 1):

WASD (Move Character)

1,2,3 (Change Character)

Space (Shoot)

(Player 2):

Arrow Keys (Move Character)

1,2,3 [Number Pad] (Change Character)

0 [Number Pad] (Shoot)
